channel.title: Mini-Summit Sep 2024 on Open Security Summit
channel.description: Recent content in Mini-Summit Sep 2024 on Open Security Summit

item.title: Using AI to identify SPAM mails
item.description: About this session GPT Application: Detecting Phishing Sites and analysing Phishing emails: Explore the forefront of email security with Abbas Haidar in this engaging session. Delve into how Generative AI, particularly GPT applications, are being utilized to effectively detect phishing sites and analyze phishing emails. This session promises to provide a comprehensive understanding of the latest AI tools and techniques, reshaping the landscape of email threat detection. What You Will Learn: The role of Generative AI in modern cybersecurity.
